title: Bug 117981: Unable to select items in library outline view on first attempt
description:
Description: Any item in the library outline view cannot be selected on the first attempt.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.

OB: On the first attempt, I am unable to select any item in the library outline view.

EB: On the second attempt, the label item should be selectable.

SR: 
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the view. It should not be selectable.
3. Retry selecting the label item. It should now be selectable.
